name: Pink Blobs Eat Pink Food
description:
Pink blobs eat pink food, but what  if they don't? 

This game was made in 48 hours for the Pride Jam based on the theme "Gender identity and roles."  This game is an interactive story/puzzle game where you discover what can be possible if you follow or break expectations. There are five different endings to discover.  Note- there are still several bug, this was made in 48 hours after all. 

Acknowledgments: 

Music - Playkoru

Sound SFX -  Fesliyan Studios and Dustyroom Game Studio
